title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - September 28th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - September 28th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the Bloomberg Global Forum. Including interviews with:

-Steve Schwarzman, Blackstone Group co-founder and CEO

-Brian Moynihan, Bank of America CEO

-Anand Mahindra, Mahindra Group Chairman

-Jonathan Gray, Blackstone Group President and COO

-Bruce Flatt Brookfield Asset Management CEO

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
